parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The constraints that you want all returned recommendations to match. restartNeeded (boolean) --- Whether or not implementing the recommendation requires a restart. rollbackPossible (boolean) --- Whether or not implementing the recommendation can be rolled back. implementationEfforts (list) --- The effort required to implement the recommendation. (string) --- accountIds (list) --- The account to which the recommendation applies. (string) --- regions (list) --- The Amazon Web Services Region of the resource. (string) --- resourceTypes (list) --- The resource type of the recommendation. (string) --- actionTypes (list) --- The type of action you can take by adopting the recommendation. (string) --- tags (list) --- A list of tags assigned to the recommendation. (dict) --- The tag structure that contains a tag key and value. key (string) --- The key that's associated with the tag. value (string) --- The value that's associated with the tag. resourceIds (list) --- The resource ID of the recommendation. (string) --- resourceArns (list) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the recommendation. (string) --- recommendationIds (list) --- The IDs for the recommendations. (string) ---

nested_params.name: restartNeeded
nested_params.description: Whether or not implementing the recommendation requires a restart.

nested_params.name: rollbackPossible
nested_params.description: Whether or not implementing the recommendation can be rolled back.

nested_params.name: implementationEfforts
nested_params.description: The effort required to implement the recommendation.

nested_params.name: accountIds
nested_params.description: The account to which the recommendation applies.

nested_params.name: regions
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the resource.

nested_params.name: resourceTypes
nested_params.description: The resource type of the recommendation.

nested_params.name: actionTypes
nested_params.description: The type of action you can take by adopting the recommendation.

nested_params.name: tags
nested_params.description: A list of tags assigned to the recommendation.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key that's associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value that's associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: resourceIds
nested_params.description: The resource ID of the recommendation.

nested_params.name: resourceArns
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the recommendation.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The ordering of recommendations by a dimension. dimension (string) --- Sorts by dimension values. order (string) --- The order that's used to sort the data.

nested_params.name: order
nested_params.description: The order that's used to sort the data.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: List of all savings recommendations.

nested_items.name: recommendationId
nested_items.description: The ID for the recommendation.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The account to which the recommendation applies.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the resource.

nested_items.name: resourceId
nested_items.description: The resource ID for the recommendation.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the recommendation.

nested_items.name: currentResourceType
nested_items.description: The current resource type.

nested_items.name: recommendedResourceType
nested_items.description: The recommended resource type.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings amount for the recommendation.

nested_items.name: estimatedSavingsPercentage
nested_items.description: The estimated savings percentage relative to the total cost over the cost calculation lookback period.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlyCost
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly cost of the current resource. For Reserved Instances and Savings Plans, it refers to the cost for eligible usage.

nested_items.name: currencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code used for the recommendation.

nested_items.name: implementationEffort
nested_items.description: The effort required to implement the recommendation.

nested_items.name: restartNeeded
nested_items.description: Whether or not implementing the recommendation requires a restart.

nested_items.name: actionType
nested_items.description: The type of tasks that can be carried out by this action.

nested_items.name: rollbackPossible
nested_items.description: Whether or not implementing the recommendation can be rolled back.

nested_items.name: currentResourceSummary
nested_items.description: Describes the current resource.

nested_items.name: recommendedResourceSummary
nested_items.description: Describes the recommended resource.

nested_items.name: lastRefreshTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the recommendation was last generated.

nested_items.name: recommendationLookbackPeriodInDays
nested_items.description: The lookback period that's used to generate the recommendation.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The source of the recommendation.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: A list of tags assigned to the recommendation.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key that's associated with the tag.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value that's associated with the tag.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results.
